sentence: The staff were very attentive and knowledgeable but the whole atmosphere was relaxed and elegant
Pretty Coastal setting
The hotel has a phenomenal setting
Surroundings amazing room smaller than expected
Whilst we have visited this hotel numerous times as external guests and to eat in the restaurant this was the first time we have stayed and what an experience
The outdoor pool was perfect with lovely views and a great atmosphere

This is an excellent hotel great service everyone always ready to help and to give explanation very good food with a lot of posibilities great environment to stay with different swimming pols excellent rooms with very good beds
The extensive gardens were very well looked after and it was no problem picking a nice spot to enjoy the surroundings while relaxing on good wicker beach chair loungers whilst taking in the sun

The setting was relaxing with soft music playing in the background and a beautiful sea view in front of us whilst sitting on a cosy rattan sofaBang on 2 pm the same guy came back to collect us and show us to our room
My only other hotel experience on this coast is the Marbela Club which is great for couples and for its country club
I am in doubt of whether it should be a bit more however this is what came out from our experience and I hope the above description will help others to make their choices
Most impressed by all aspects of this hotel
Throughout there were little touches that added up to a great experience
However we did notice that many of the nearby restaurants were set up as clubs and trendy party locations
2016 Christmas Brunch Overpriced and Low Experience
The experience at the Kempinski is first rate i have never been disappointed here

I do n’t think any review can actually make this pace any better this has absolutely been the best incentive experience everThe attention to detail of every single member of the Team has been simply outstanding
But these things did not influence our overall very positive experience here

There is a facility right next to the hotels beachfront that rents paddle boats and provides various types of water experiences we did not really check it out so I can not speak to it but the paddle boats looked nice
The room we were moved to that was better but still not what we have always had over the years1The way we were treated trying to book was not what I have experienced over the years2

Whilst this adds to the exclusive feel of the hotel the public areas are off putting as they lack atmosphere to access the apartment from the pool areas you had to walk via the hotel lobby which was a huge hike
Can hear waves while sleping the best experience
For this standard and this prices you should expect a childfre quiet environment at least at some parts of the hotel
